GSD.description:
drbd: fix potential silent data corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 3b99e91ce7cf484aab5b655063f928ba17087c01. For more details please see the references link.
